toc.title: An introduction to R
toc.description: A brief overview of what R is and why it has become one of the most popular platforms for data analysis in the biosciences and in data science.

toc.title: Working with simple data
toc.description: An overview of working with different types of data at the R command line.

toc.title: Working with tables
toc.description: How to load and manipulate tabular data in R.
